name: Save Toya
description:
Game developed for the Global Game Jam 2022!

Lithuania, year 2077, after a nuclear explosion, the days in the country are now different. We have day and night together all day long. One side of the country is night and the other, it’s day. 

To survive, you have to complete the tasks quickly enough before you get caught by the radioactive dust. 

How to play:

- Collect all the crystals within the time limit to beat the level.

- WASD to move Toya. 

- Space to jump/mantle.

- Ctrl to crouch.

- C to roll.   

- Shift to run.

- You cannot jump into the water, so be carefull!
